titleStmt.title: Ane meditatioun vpon the xxv, xxvi, xxvii, xxviii, and xxix verses of the XV chapt. of the first buke of the Chronicles of the Kingis set doun be the maist Christiane king and sincere professour of the treuth Iames the Sext King of Scottis.
titleStmt.author: James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

notesStmt.note: STC 14380 on reel 572 is actually STC 14376.--Cf. reel guide.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
